keyword.title: Search Keyword
keyword.description: What type of business to search for (e.g., 'restaurants', 'dentists', 'coffee shops')

location.title: Location
location.description: City, address, or ZIP code to search in (e.g., 'Brooklyn, NY', 'Austin, TX', '90210')

maxResults.title: Maximum Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of businesses to scrape (1-500)

minRating.title: Minimum Rating
minRating.description: Only include businesses with this rating or higher (0 = no filter)

minReviews.title: Minimum Reviews
minReviews.description: Only include businesses with at least this many reviews (0 = no filter)

filterByPriceLevel.title: Filter by Price Level
filterByPriceLevel.description: Filter by price level symbols (leave empty for no filter). Select multiple to include all matching levels. Note: This is not strict.

minPrice.title: Minimum Price
minPrice.description: Minimum price in dollars (e.g., 50 will filter out businesses cheaper than $50). 0 = no filter

maxPrice.title: Maximum Price
maxPrice.description: Maximum price in dollars (e.g., 100 will filter out businesses more expensive than $100). 0 = no filter

findEmails.title: Find Email Addresses
findEmails.description: Attempt to find email addresses from Google profiles and business websites (increases run time)

extractBusinessHours.title: Extract Business Hours
extractBusinessHours.description: Extract operating hours for each business (may add 5-10 seconds per business)

useProxy.title: Use Proxy
useProxy.description: Use proxy to avoid blocking (highly recommended for >50 results)

proxyType.title: Proxy Type
proxyType.description: AUTO: Apify datacenter proxies (fast, cheap). RESIDENTIAL: Apify residential proxies (expensive, may have geo issues). CUSTOM: Your own proxy URLs (fastest, you control costs).

customProxyUrls.title: Custom Proxy URLs
customProxyUrls.description: Your own proxy URLs (only used when Proxy Type = CUSTOM). Format: http://username:password@proxy-host:port or socks5://proxy-host:port. Add multiple for rotation.

fastMode.title: Fast Mode
fastMode.description: Reduce delays between actions for faster scraping (use with good proxies). Normal: ~6s/business, Fast: ~2s/business. May increase blocking risk.

exportToCsv.title: Export to CSV
exportToCsv.description: Export results as CSV file in addition to JSON (CSV file will be saved in key-value store as 'OUTPUT')
